column1: The Purple Pig////For dessert we opted for their popular "Sicilian Iris." I will admit by dessert time
column3: and whenever we're completely full we skip dessert. But since it was our anniversary and since it's the Purple Pig
column4: we had to try a little bit of everything. The Sicilian iris
column5: was tasty. It came warm and the fried ball was huge. It came stuffed ricotta
column6: and chocolate chip. It reminded me of a warm gooey ball version of a cannoli. I wouldn't mind ordering this again.
